Qualcomm relentlessly innovates to deliver intelligent computing everywhere, helping the world tackle its most important challenges. Our proven solutions drive transformation across major industries and our Snapdragon® platforms power extraordinary consumer experiences. Building on our nearly 40-year leadership in setting industry standards and creating era-defining technology breakthroughs, we deliver leading-edge AI, high performance, low-power computing, and unrivaled connectivity. Together with our ecosystem partners, we enable next-generation digital transformation to enrich lives, improve businesses, and advance societies. At Qualcomm, we are engineering human progress.

We are looking for an experienced Digital Strategist to join the Digital Marketing team. This position will lead the development and execution of innovative digital strategies that support our Artificial Intelligence (AI) business, which is a key growth area for the company. The ideal candidate will bring fresh thinking to the table and have experience managing multiple complex digital marketing initiatives across channels including the website, social media (TikTok, Instagram, X, LinkedIn), YouTube, Discord, paid media advertising, search, and social influencer collaborations. This role will be instrumental in Qualcomm’s digital storytelling as the power of our on-device and hybrid AI technologies lead the transformation of many industries, including smartphones, PCs, XR, automotive and IoT.

• Develop digital strategies, plans and activations in partnership with Product Marketing. This includes recommendations for all digital touchpoints including owned, earned and paid media channels – in partnership with paid media and campaign leads

We’re starting with the 572 million hispanics in the world, with the goal to become the audio content marketplace for the entire 7.3 billion non-English speaking market underserved in local language content. We would love for you to join us on this journey!

• Beek team first — We are the kind of company where we clean everyone's dirty dishes even if they’re not ours, as if we were at home
• Be an animal — We’re passionate and hustle to find creative solutions to every problem and never give up. EVER.

We are looking for a Creative Storyteller in charge of conducting creative sessions and landing all ideas into scripts for Beek's original productions. This role is responsible for translating briefs into creative proposals, conducting creative sessions, interviewing expert content creators across various fields, and generate original audio scripts. Using AI in the development and creation of the content is a plus. In addition, you must be able to identify unique voices and adapting writing styles accordingly.

The Creative Storyteller role at Beek is in the Content area, which is responsible for producing and distributing the audio content that inhabits the platform, as well as attracting and working with content creators in the development of original pieces.

You are the person in charge of developing scripts for original productions in Spanish together with content creators. This includes conducting creative sessions, landing ideas, making content suggestions and conceptualizing stories.

• Develop content with Latin America's most respected creators and work with them to land their idea in a script with a strong, engaging and high quality narrative.

• Implement natural language processing algorithms to analyze and compare consistency of tone and voice in scripts, ensuring desired consistency.
• Use AI-based recommender systems to provide personalized feedback to freelance writers, ensuring alignment with Beek's quality standards.

• Collaborate cross-functionally to ensure that your content launches are successful.

You know that company culture is just as important as strategy and growth. For you, no challenge is too big or solution too small.

You'll be responsible for everything from orchestrating data pipelines for efficient processing to implementing automation that facilitates continuous integration and deployment (CI/CD) and fosters a highly scalable, reliable, and secure environment for our AI workflows. Data Management and Integration:

- Integrate diverse data sources seamlessly and keep a version control of it.

Automation and Continuous Delivery:

- Implement robust automation scripts to streamline training, deployment, and monitoring of ML models.

- Implement a version control flow for ML models.

Infrastructure Management:

- Leverage cloud platforms like AWS, Azure, or Google Cloud to build and manage a secure, scalable, and reliable AI infrastructure.

- Implement and maintain best practices for cloud resource allocation and optimization.

Monitoring and Optimization:

- Develop and implement dashboards to monitor the performance and health of data pipelines and deployed models.

- Continuously optimize ML models for efficiency and accuracy, ensuring peak performance in production.

Collaboration and Innovation:

- Collaborate effectively with data scientists, ML engineers, and other stakeholders to ensure smooth ML operations.

job_description:
Req ID 67157 MSSC Monterrey 2 800901, Mexico

ZF is a global technology company supplying systems for passenger cars, commercial vehicles and industrial technology, enabling the next generation of mobility. ZF allows vehicles to see, think and act. In the four technology domains of Vehicle Motion Control, Integrated Safety, Automated Driving, and Electric Mobility, ZF offers comprehensive product and software solutions for established vehicle manufacturers and newly emerging transport and mobility service providers. ZF electrifies a wide range of vehicle types.

ZF is looking for an AI Innovation Facilitator Intern to coordinate our dynamic team of AI Engineering Interns in Monterrey towards groundbreaking achievements in artificial intelligence. This unique internship is designed for an individual with a strong foundation in AI and a passion for mentoring peers.

The AI Innovation Facilitator will be responsible for steering the direction of project work, fostering an environment of creativity and innovation, and ensuring the team's efforts align with the latest AI trends and technologies. If you have a passion for AI, coupled with leadership qualities and eager to support and drive a team of like-minded individuals, we invite you to apply.

Responsibilities:
• Innovation Management: Foster an innovative environment where creative solutions are encouraged and explored. Ensure the team is constantly pushing the boundaries of what's possible in AI.
• Strategic Planning: Define and implement strategic project plans that resonate with the latest AI advancements and organizational goals.
• Collaboration: Work closely with other departments and stakeholders to integrate AI solutions across the organization, ensuring projects meet business needs.
• Research and Development: Stay abreast of the latest developments in AI, machine learning, and related fields. Encourage and oversee research initiatives within the team.
• Problem-Solving: Lead the team in troubleshooting and solving complex problems, encouraging innovative approaches and solutions.

Requirements:
• Education: Currently in the final year of a Bachelor’s degree in Innovation and Development Engineering, Computer Science, Data Science, Mechatronics, Robotics or a related field with a significant AI component.
• Leadership Potential: Strong leadership qualities with the ability to mentor, inspire, and drive a team of peers towards achieving the project goals.
• Innovative Thinking: A forward-thinking mindset with an inclination towards innovation and problem-solving, with the ability to foster this within a team.
• Communication Skills: Excellent verbal and written communication skills in both English and Spanish, capable of conveying complex concepts clearly, facilitating effective team collaboration and collaborate effectively with various stakeholders.
• Adaptability: Flexibility to adapt to new challenges, technologies, and project requirements in a dynamic environment.
• Passion for AI: A genuine enthusiasm for artificial intelligence, machine learning, and technological innovation.
• Experience and Skills: Demonstrable knowledge of AI, machine learning, or related fields, whether in academic projects, clubs, or previous internships is a plus.

What we offer:
• Competitive economical allowance
• Hybrid work

Be part of our ZF team as ZF AI Innovation Facilitator - Internship Program and apply now!
